attributes.action: MOJ to justify release Jon Venables
attributes.additional_details:
The MOJ should provide justification for the Parole Board's decision to release Jon Venables into the community.

This justification should provide:
1) evidence to  support the Board's belief that Venables will adhere to the conditions of his licence;
2) evidence to  support the Board's belief that Venables represents no danger to children.
